name: Equilibrium Brewery- Taproom and Bonfire Restaurant

reviews.text: Never disappoints! Outstanding beer and the best brisket. Make sure you try the Mac n cheese.

Have been coming here for years and am never disappointed in their beer and usually find a new favorite. Currently they‚Äôre ‚Äústraight outta the double marshmallow laboratory‚Äù DIPA. Their food is always great also!
Always a good beer
Great food and great beer

We will be back
Excellent food n beers n atmosphere

We had heard about this place for a while and we finally decided to check it out! It was a lot of fun and very good! Low key vibes and nice staff. Drinks were good and food was GREAT!!! Poutine, soft pretzels, Thai chili wings, and mac n cheese! We will definitely be returning!
Ryan and Kailey were amazing they gave me great beer options to choose from. I will definitely be coming back to see them again.!!!!

Absolutely loved it. The Photon is classic Pale Ale that drinks like a hazy. Well balanced and fresh. The stout was remarkable! Thick as a stout should be with all the flavors present. Our burger was delish and the staff was friendly and attentive. Couldn‚Äôt recommend more to a beer connoisseur!
Excellent Beers! Excellent Service! Excellent venue!
Great beer and great atmosphere. Highly recommend!
Awesome place with great food
This place is great! Beers are delicious and their food is amazing especially the wings!!!
EQ is like a family. I love the vibes and the environment. The bartenders to the cooks are amazing. 100/10 recommend!
Food and beer was good feeling bad for the beautiful bartender doing everything on her own. üôè‚Ä¶

Wonderful place wonderful space beautiful circular tap room. Nice brutalist with incredibly detailed and exquisite descriptions. They don‚Äôt have flights but you can get 4 ounce pores of several different bruise so it‚Äôs similar to having a‚Ä¶
Nice atmosphere, good bartending staff and beer
Nice vibe. Great selection of beers and food!
Amazing selection and super friendly staff
The best brewery in America. Amazing DIPAs and stouts
Great open space with outside seating as well. I like the oorters

We hosted our rehearsal dinner here for our wedding last year. Equillibrium went out of their way to ensure it was an amazing experience. Affordable, excellent food, great service, and a laid back casual environment all made this an‚Ä¶
Great food, even better beer! Get the Theory of Tides
Plenty of variety to choose from. Staff was friendly. The food was a bonus!

Beautiful facility and nice bartenders. Beer review is on Untappd, this is for lunch as a whole. Spiced Fries are shoestring and came out piping hot. I could see the spice, but not taste it. Brisket sandwich is tasty, though the brisket was‚Ä¶
We are amazed with the different options with IPA‚Äôs. I love the atmosphere and of course the deli food‚Ä¶ very recommended!
One of my favorite breweries and always a must stop when in the area
Chill spot in Mtown with good beer and good food. Nice vibe and staff.
This summer seemed to be a down season for these guys.  Their offerings were sparse unlike past seasons.

I sat at the bar for over 20 minutes before I was asked if I needed a menu, then waited another 15 minutes before the girl bussing tables finally asked me if I was being helped. The beer was pretty good but it was entirely overshadowed by‚Ä¶

Food is ok,  expensive for what it is. Beer option on menu looks ok, only had one.  No brown ales.    Oddly even though it is not busy, you can expect to get ignored at the bar, where you have to order food and drink from.  Would skip.  Music was good though with live music.  Place itself looks nice nice.
Great food, better brews.

The french fries were dry with pulled pork, smh. Customer service was terrible. Food was terrible. You had to get up and go and get your to go plates. No waitresses, you had to order from the bar to sit at your table. Music was too loud to hear each other.Speak! Doesn't feel like a barbecue spot!
Absolutely AMAZING!!
Food was mid
I recommend this to everybody who passes through beer is amazing. Vibe is good.

I placed my order today, hoping I was going to get out of Work on time. Send my partner to pick up my food realizing I‚Äôm late. except just giving it to him  or telling him hey it might be cold. We  have to redo it. He got a nasty laughter . Thank you for redoing it .. we didn‚Äôt ask you to because I knew I was late . He didn‚Äôt have to get condescending attitude either. ( edit thank you for answering but the  tone of your reply seems pretty much  how the attitude of the staff you have . They can remember my meal but not the attitude wow not surprised . I‚Äôm very grateful for redoing of the order even though at your ‚Äú expense ‚Äú like I said I didn‚Äôt ask you guys to do it because I knew I was late . Sometimes work has you longer than you expect and I didn‚Äôt mind so thank you but my issue wasn‚Äôt your food but it was experience. Even more for a small business wouldn‚Äôt you want to hear what you can improve ? . I rarely give out review only when the experience is bad just like this one .

Opted to stop in a 2nd time to Equilibrium and what a great choice! We decided to sit at the bar and we were greeted by Sam! Wow! Not only were we impressed with the great selection but Sam was awesome! She‚Äôs bubbly, cheerful, polite,‚Ä¶

I was there today with my wife and felt that the  waiter totally ignored me and my wife. I sat at a table for approximately 10 minutes and noticed that the waiter walking around fixing the menus at other tables outside and just walked by us‚Ä¶
Was in town for a wedding and took a chance and was not disappointed - it‚Äôs a must !!
Top 3 Favorite breweries! Great beer, friendly staff, relaxed atmosphere. 7 min off of 84 and definitely worth the detour!

My wife and I stopped in to Equilibrium for the very first time last week while traveling up to the Hudson Valley area. No issue finding a parking spot on a Thursday evening in their lot. We were greeted right away by Rosa who made us feel welcomed and had a seat at the bar. The beer was everything we expected it to be which was great of course as we‚Äôve had some of their brews before. We got a light dinner of chicken tenders that came with fries and a side of potato salad. The food was priced well and enough for the two of us to split. You can tell Rosa is a staple at the brewery as many patrons knew her and had conversation. We grabbed some four packs and stickers to go and headed out but had a great overall experience and would definitely stop again next time we are heading through Middletown!

Spent the afternoon here catching up with friends.  Have had the beers but never visited the Taproom.  What great place!  Nice atmosphere and pleasant staff.  A large and extensive beer list to choose from with a variety ir styles.  The‚Ä¶

Beautiful setup, delicious beer and food !!
10/10 all day everyday
Beer is great
Great place ! Everyone was nice and beers are good.

Immediately greeted by friendly and informative staff. Made you feel welcomed. Everything you needed to know was explained clearly and professionally, but with a personal atmosphere that made you feel relaxed. Here on vacation. Well worth‚Ä¶

We just started carrying the Equilibrium/Other Half collab at a bar in Brooklyn.
It‚Äôs banging and customers love it.‚Ä¶
This location is amazing!  The best beer, great food and terrific upscale brewery atmosphere
Excellent beer, excellent pulled pork.
Great selection of beers and food menu featuring barbecue. Outdoor seating is perfect in nice weather. Also accommodating for private parties.

Our last visit to EQ was for Father‚Äôs Day 3 years ago, though we‚Äôve been fans for years, since the original location opened and my husband has picked up beer many times since. Sadly yesterday‚Äôs visit for Father's Day fell short of our expectations for a few reasons, mostly due to them being understaffed and having 3 amazing bartenders serving the entire bar, restaurant, and outdoor area. I made a reservation online for 3 people at 12:30 and we arrived and were seated by one of the bartenders, who gave us menus and told us to order at the bar. That seemed odd, since 3 of us were getting food, but it quickly became clear that there was no traditional waitstaff (last time we came for Father‚Äôs Day, we ordered directly from the table using QR codes, which was totally fine so we could order more as we wanted and then check out online). We had to remember orders for 3 people and wait at the bar to order, which took time, and by 12:45, they were out of the advertised bone-in beef rib, which my husband wanted. Not sure how they sold out of a special so quickly. We got our drinks and settled down then proceeded to wait 45 minutes (yes, 45) for 2 brisket sandwiches, a ¬Ω lb of brisket, pretzels, and skillet mac n cheese. The fries that came with the sandwiches were not even lukewarm, so I assume they had been sitting until one of the bartenders could grab them to bring to our table. Someone else brought the skillet of mac n cheese shortly after and warned us that it was ‚Äúhot‚Äù to which I replied ‚Äúat least something is hot‚Äù because our meals weren‚Äôt (she laughed, no offer of further assistance). Getting a 2nd round of drinks took about 10 minutes as well and at that point, we wanted to settle up and leave after. I will say that the food was very good and the brisket was flavorful but waiting 45 minutes for cold food negated it. Waiting to pay to get out also took another good 10 minutes or so. Then my husband wanted to stop at the retail shop to get a few bottles on the way out. Had to wait there as well for one of the bartenders to come over to assist. I asked him if it‚Äôs normally this short handed and he sighed and said they didn‚Äôt realize it would be so busy on Father‚Äôs Day. The bartenders did a great job but 3 people cannot manage to serve an entire bar and restaurant. Other patrons looked annoyed as well as people were piled around the bar waiting to order and when we left around 2:30, a table who arrived shortly after us still had not gotten their food. Though the food was good, it was not worth the wait time to stand at the bar and have to wait and order food and drinks. We could have had a much better experience elsewhere. I don‚Äôt know who thought that was an adequate amount of staff to have at a brewery, especially on Father‚Äôs Day, but we will not be back and will stick to beer pickup or shipping in the future.

Equilibrium has held up well over the years and I fondly recall the days of standing in line for releases.  Some things stay the same which is solid beer plus the bonus of really good food.  The smoked pork on the poutine and quesadilla was‚Ä¶

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

I recently had the pleasure of dining at Equilibrium Bonfire Brewery, and it was a fantastic experience! We stopped in for dinner and drinks, and I can't say enough about the amazing food. We tried the burger and the BBQ, both of which were absolutely delicious. The flavors were bold and fresh, and the presentation was top-notch.

The standout for us was definitely the beer. The selection was impressive, and every brew we tried was crafted to perfection. Each sip showcased the brewery's commitment to quality and creativity.

The atmosphere was welcoming and laid-back ‚Äî perfect for enjoying a great meal with friends. The staff was friendly and attentive, making our experience even more enjoyable.

Overall, I highly recommend Equilibrium Bonfire Brewery for anyone looking for delicious food and outstanding craft beer. We can‚Äôt wait to return!
This is the brewery to go to if you‚Äôre in Middletown NY! Great atmosphere and amazing food. Free beer tastings every hour from 1-7pm, need I say more!

Equilibrium boasts a great atmosphere, a decent selection of unique beers, and friendly staff. I had the pleasure of conversing with one of the brewmasters, which proved to be very informative. The food selection was impressive, and our‚Ä¶
Fantastic Brewery, but here‚Äôs the thing‚Ä¶ I‚Äôve never been before but accidentally ended up in a hotel 2 miles away on a trip.‚Ä¶

Equilibrium has been on my brewery bucket list since i can remember. I finally made the trek up to middle town and i couldn‚Äôt be happier. Visited with my family and they loved it. Let‚Äôs start with the amazing location, with the great‚Ä¶

Great place, airy vibe, friendly bartenders.
Pulled pork sando and burger were great, and the fennel salad was awesome (added crispy chicken for $3). The wings were a mixed bag‚Ä¶not too meaty/juicy, and the‚Ä¶

Food was really good. I wish they had a wait staff, having to order drinks at the bar, sides at the bar, meat at another area.....

But that's definitely not enough to make me gives them less than 4 stars! The BBQ was great....smoked, dry rubbed & sauce on the side!  This place is a definite must try!

Brewery that has everything you want.  Deep variety of beers on tap and tremendous food menu including barbecue - offered by a knowledgeable, friendly, and polite staff.  A must stop when in Middletown area.

Goede sfeer, lekker eten, goed bier en een knappe barvrouw die lijkt op Jutta Leerdam.
Ik kom hier zeker nog een keer.!

Always good vibes and energy. The customer service is always on point! As soon as you walk in they greet you and make you feel welcomed. MC4 is my favorite beer which is still a IPA but not over powering. The food option isn‚Äôt my favorite‚Ä¶
Equilibrium brewery was outstanding. Excellent brew options. Definitely try their sours. Awesome atmosphere and delicious food. Oh yeah, and they are pet and kid friendly! I'm definitely going back!
Had best time ever here. This taproom looks amazing!! Great food, delicious beers, and service is first class.

Extremely disappointed! Was served old, cold and hard food from look like the previous days. It‚Äôs mind blowing that they would actually serve old food that they didn‚Äôt care to heat. I guess it didn‚Äôt matter to them. üò°üò°
Collards were old and dried out, wings were extremely hard, old and tasteless, Mac and cheese was cold, brisket was cold, hard and dried out, and the cornbread was stale with cold butter.
The Wribs were just ok.
Customer service was good however would never patronize this establishment again.

Equilibrium Brewery- Taproom and Bonfire Restaurant is a nice spot for casual drinks and food. There are indoor and outdoor dining options available

They have a nice selection of beers on tap which are brewed onsite. You can get different serving sizes from 4 oz, 8 oz and 12 oz which is nice to try a variety of beers.

They also serve BBQ which was very delicious I especially enjoyed the pork belly which was tender.

Service was wonderful and very patient with our large group.

Nice place with indoor and outdoor seating.  BBQ pit and cool looking heater torches.  Wide selection of beer. On site kitchen for food. Friendly service. UPDATE August 2022: The beer is good. The food is just OK, not Great. Indoor seating‚Ä¶

Simply outstanding! We traveled from Delaware just to check this place out because we love their beer. Located in the quaint town of Middletown NY, Equilibrium produces IPA's and Stouts of the highest quality. The new pub itself is airy‚Ä¶

Super cute brewery with great food. Vegan ribs and Brussel sprouts are a must! The staff were friendly and the place has an inviting vibe. Very busy on a Sunday late afternoon, plenty of familys with kids too. There is a circular bar in the‚Ä¶

Update Fall 2023:
They've updated their ordering methods. For beer, rather than scanning code on the table, you go to the bar to be served; for food, you go to the register by the kitchen. This new system works fine. Beer and food are still great.

Update:
Highly recommend as it's still a fantastic place with great beers and food. I'm partial to their hazies of which there are many tasty options, and there are plenty other options with farmhouse, sour, and stout options.

Original:
Definitely recommend! We'll be coming back again for sure. This place is great with amazing beers, the best around the area. Their hazy and juicy IPAs abundantly satisfy your palate, and their sours are good, too. And a huge bonus: absolutely delicious food!

We just stop by, after doing some hiking on Sam's Point, OMG..the Best option ever..!! Congratulations to the barbecue master, the brisket was delicious, tender, smoked, don't need it the barbecue sauce....everything was amazing. The‚Ä¶

Excellent food. Excellent beer.
Enjoyable location with large patio and lots of windows. Friendly staff and customers.
Well worth a visit!

Top notch beers served by a fantastic staff. Some of the best IPAs you can find in New York -- don't leave without trying MC¬≤, the brewery flagship, a plate of brisket, and an order of chicken wings (for the latter, the BBQ sauce is my personal fave, but you can't go wrong with those smoked baddies.)

Truly awesome brewery. Some of the most consistently great beers I've ever had. Nearly all of their brews are top notch, delicious, and high ABV which is difficult to combine with great flavor. The atmosphere is cool, sticking to the‚Ä¶

Super high quality brewery here. They seem to specialize in IPAs, maybe DIPAs. Which were all great. And right up my alley. The BBQ outside also smelled terrific. But we were just passing through on our way to another BBQ. So we didn‚Äôt get‚Ä¶

Great beer and great food! I prefer the Brisket and a nice double or triple IPA. Darts and pinball too.
A must visit in Middletown.

Update: Service has been very good the last few times. You can scan a barcode at your table and order beers and they‚Äôll literally drop them off in under a minute on a normal day!  My only suggestion is bigger pours. 8 oz for a double or triple is smaller than most spots.
4.5 stars

Wow!!!! The food was amazing, the drinks were even better!!! I had chicken and waffles off the brunch meun.The fried chicken was the best fried chicken that I had at any restaurant. I had a mimosa beer to go with it, which was the perfect balance of beer and orange juice. My boyfriend had the BBQ brisk sandwich that had a perfect texture and a perfect balance, picked onions cheese, and BBQ sause. The name of the brewery is Equilibrium, and it is the perfect name. The quality of beer and food is phenomenal they truly stive for a perfect balance even in the deor. I live 2 and a half hours away, and we will be returning to Equilibrium.

Tap room was pretty lit, I do love the wide variety and selection of beers they‚Äôve got. Food was freakin phenomenal but heads up if you get the brisket, it‚Äôs one piece of brisket. Pretty chill atmosphere and staff is pretty chill too. Parking tends to full up fast so if you can share a ride with friends be easier

Great taproom, friendly staff, crazy 1/2 priced taps on Monday nights. Sat at the bar and sampled several of their beers. Having had a few of their beers before, I would say they are even better fresh from the taproom. Awesome  spot to visit, wish I lived closer.

Great beer. Worst customer service, ambiance, and general front of house experience I've had at a major micro. Employees seemed to hate it there, severely understaffed for fathers day while simultaneously running specials, and highly‚Ä¶
Celebrated my husbands 40th and we had an amazing time! Beer beakers were a great hit! The staff was A-1 and food was on point. We will definitely be coming back!!

Five star environment + service, four star beer, three star bbq. Loved the cole slaw, potato salad and Mac&cheese, but the meat was pretty flavorless/dry, the cornbread was super dry/crumbly. I‚Äôll definitely be back, just may not make it a destination for a full meal!
Great spot to enjoy delicious beers. I haven't had the BBQ yet, but I hear it's amazing. I'd love to go back. Plenty of parking and the system theu have set up for can releases is great.
